data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Amazonas, Brazil to the gospel today.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Amazonas, Brazil
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 868,109 believers in the state of Amazonas with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Amazonas, Brazil need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Jesus, provide a Bible for every believer in Amazonas, Brazil, and teach them to obey it.
data.verse: For if you listen to the word and don’t obey, it is like glancing at your face in a mirror. 24 you see yourself, walk away, and forget what you look like. 25 But if you look carefully into the perfect law that sets you free, and if you do what it says and don’t forget what you heard, then God will bless you for doing it.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Hupde people might believe through him.
Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Amazonas, Brazil into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Amazonas a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Father, help the 868,109 believers in Amazonas to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.
